Starscream

Starscream jumped at Drillbit's order, and immediatly zoomed down on 
Inferno, pleased it was now a two on one, and fired 20 rapid shots. 
But than he realized he couldn't let this other bot get away. If it 
got away, she would tell Megatron where Inferno is, and he would come 
for him. He commed Drillbit.

"You take care of Inferno and get him back to base. I'll get that 
other bot. We can't let her get away with the info she has!"

Starscream started flying after KitKat
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix and Fliq arrived back at the Ark, relieved that they could now 
put their hard attained supplied into the Ark. They went inside and 
began installing new computer boards.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois smiled, thinking what a delight it must have been to have been 
working with these people just a short time ago. He slumped beside a 
wall and turned to Cybershark.

"Wake me up in two mega-cycles, and than I'll take over. We'll 
protect ourselves over the night, and perform the experiment 
tomorrow. Who knows, by this time tomorrow we could all be sipping 
energon on Cybertron."

Vulois fell asleep, but he had another dream.

It was a continuation of the previuos dream. In it, Battera and 
Cybershark had arrived, at were attempting to free Vulois from his 
chains. Than the evil Vulois appeared, and fryed them both, growing 
new chains oon Vulois. The evil Vulois transformed into Child, and 
gazed at him.

"Oh great Vulois! Train me! Make me as great as you!" Just than the 
being split, becoming Child and someone he had never seen before, but 
some how knew his name.

"Nemesis....Nemesis Enforcer?"

"Right Vulois."(Not moding! Dream sequence!), "Little did you know, 
but for all your mission I planned to destroy it. And now you have 
done you job for me, and crushed yourself. But now I have a new task, 
and that is to defeat Child and NEVER give peace a chance. And what 
your doing....could be very bad for these plans. You remember 
everything here, but when you wake up, you won't even remember this 
dream. If you remember your memories though, you will remember this. 
And you will try to stop me. So I will strengthen your chains, and 
never et the old you leak out again!"

A massive cross came out of the ground, and Vulois was pierced 
against it.

"Now let your Alliance personality come back to you!"

With that the dream ended, and the evil Vulois came back to take 
control of the body.
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers

All the Trainers had come out of the CR, and Prebon was planning.

"It would take too long to develop a weapon to counter act their 
chips. We must attack now, while they are weak! We will simply kill 
them, fix their bodies, remove the chip, and use them to store new 
sparks who will serve us. Come Trainers, we attack the Ark again in 
one mega-cycle!"
